1 #pragma once

3 #include "AudioCodecs/CodecOpus.h"
4 #include "AudioTools/AudioTypes.h"
5 #include "AudioTools/Buffers.h"
6 #include "oggz/oggz.h"
7 
8 #define OGG_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE (2048)
9 
10 namespace audio_tools {
11 
20 class OggDecoder : public AudioDecoder {
21  public:
26  OggDecoder() { LOGD(LOG_METHOD); }
27 
29  void setOutputStream(Print &out_stream) override { p_print = &out_stream; }
30 
31  void setNotifyAudioChange(AudioBaseInfoDependent &bi) override {
32  this->bid = &bi;
33  }
34 
35  AudioBaseInfo audioInfo() override { return cfg; }
36 
37  void begin(AudioBaseInfo info) {
38  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
39  cfg = info;
40  if (bid != nullptr) {
41  bid->setAudioInfo(cfg);
42  }
43  is_open = true;
44  }
45 
46  void begin() override {
47  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
48  if (p_oggz == nullptr) {
49  p_oggz = oggz_new(OGGZ_READ | OGGZ_AUTO);
50  // Callback to Replace standard IO
51  oggz_io_set_read(p_oggz, ogg_io_read, this);
52  oggz_io_set_seek(p_oggz, ogg_io_seek, this);
53  oggz_io_set_tell(p_oggz, ogg_io_tell, this);
54 
55  // Callback
56  oggz_set_read_callback(p_oggz, -1, read_packet, this);
57  }
58 
59  is_open = true;
60  }
61 
62  void end() override {
63  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
64  is_open = false;
65  oggz_close(p_oggz);
66  p_oggz = nullptr;
67  }
68 
69  virtual size_t write(const void *in_ptr, size_t in_size) override {
70  LOGI("write: %u", in_size);
71  if (p_print == nullptr) return 0;
72  size_t result = buffer.writeArray((uint8_t *)in_ptr, in_size);
73 
74  // Read all bytes into oggz, calling any read callbacks on the fly.
75  LOGD("oggz_read...");
76  while ((oggz_read(p_oggz, in_size)) > 0)
77  ;
78 
79  return result;
80  }
81 
82  virtual operator boolean() override { return is_open; }
83 
84  protected:
85  RingBuffer<uint8_t> buffer{OGG_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE};
86  Print *p_print = nullptr;
87  OGGZ *p_oggz = nullptr;
88  AudioBaseInfoDependent *bid = nullptr;
89  AudioBaseInfo cfg;
90  bool is_open = false;
91  long pos = 0;
92 
93  // Final Stream Callback
94  static size_t ogg_io_read(void *user_handle, void *buf, size_t n) {
95  LOGI("ogg_io_read: %u", n);
96  OggDecoder *self = (OggDecoder *)user_handle;
97  int len = self->buffer.readArray((uint8_t *)buf, n);
98  self->pos += len;
99  return len;
100  }
101  static int ogg_io_seek(void *user_handle, long offset, int whence) {
102  LOGI("ogg_io_seek: %u", offset);
103  return -1;
104  }
105 
106  static long ogg_io_tell(void *user_handle) {
107  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
108  OggDecoder *self = (OggDecoder *)user_handle;
109  return self->pos;
110  }
111 
112  // Process full packet
113  static int read_packet(OGGZ *oggz, oggz_packet *zp, long serialno,
114  void *user_data) {
115  OggDecoder *self = (OggDecoder *)user_data;
116  ogg_packet *op = &zp->op;
117  int result = op->bytes;
118  LOGI("read_packet: %u", result);
119  if (op->b_o_s) {
120  self->beginOfSegment(op);
121  } else if (op->e_o_s) {
122  self->endOfSegment(op);
123  } else {
124  LOGD("audio");
125  self->p_print->write(op->packet, op->bytes);
126  }
127  return result;
128  }
129 
130  virtual void beginOfSegment(ogg_packet *op) {
131  LOGD("bos");
132  if (op->bytes >= sizeof(cfg)) {
133  memcpy(&cfg, op->packet, sizeof(cfg));
134  cfg.logInfo();
135  notify();
136  }
137  }
138 
139  virtual void endOfSegment(ogg_packet *op) {
140  // end segment not supported
141  LOGW("e_o_s");
142  }
143 
144  virtual void notify() {
145  if (bid != nullptr) {
146  bid->setAudioInfo(cfg);
147  }
148  }
149 };
150 
159 class OggEncoder : public AudioEncoder {
160  public:
161  // Empty Constructor - the output stream must be provided with begin()
162  OggEncoder() {}
163 
165  void setOutputStream(Print &out_stream) override { p_print = &out_stream; }
166 
168  const char *mime() override { return mime_pcm; }
169 
171  virtual void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo from) override { cfg = from; }
172 
173  virtual void begin(AudioBaseInfo from) {
174  setAudioInfo(cfg);
175  begin();
176  }
177 
179  virtual void begin() override {
180  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
181  is_open = true;
182  if (p_oggz == nullptr) {
183  p_oggz = oggz_new(OGGZ_WRITE);
184  serialno = oggz_serialno_new(p_oggz);
185  oggz_io_set_write(p_oggz, ogg_io_write, this);
186  packetno = 0;
187  granulepos = 0;
188 
189  writeHeader();
190  }
191  }
192 
194  void begin(Print &out) {
195  p_print = &out;
196  begin();
197  }
198 
200  void end() override {
201  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
202 
203  writeFooter();
204 
205  is_open = false;
206  oggz_close(p_oggz);
207  p_oggz = nullptr;
208  }
209 
211  virtual size_t write(const void *in_ptr, size_t in_size) override {
212  if (!is_open || p_print == nullptr) return 0;
213  LOGD("write: %u", in_size);
214 
215  op.packet = (uint8_t *)in_ptr;
216  op.bytes = in_size;
217  op.granulepos = granulepos +=
218  in_size / sizeof(int16_t) / cfg.channels; // sample
219  op.b_o_s = false;
220  op.e_o_s = false;
221  op.packetno = packetno++;
222  if (!writePacket(in_size)) {
223  return 0;
224  }
225  return in_size;
226  }
227 
228  operator boolean() override { return is_open; }
229 
230  bool isOpen() { return is_open; }
231 
232  protected:
233  Print *p_print = nullptr;
234  volatile bool is_open;
235  OGGZ *p_oggz = nullptr;
236  ogg_packet op;
237  size_t granulepos = 0;
238  size_t packetno = 0;
239  long serialno = -1;
240  AudioBaseInfo cfg;
241 
242  virtual bool writePacket(int in_size, int flag = 0) {
243  LOGD("oggz_write_feed: %u", in_size);
244  long result = oggz_write_feed(p_oggz, &op, serialno, flag, NULL);
245  if (result < 0) {
246  LOGE("oggz_write_feed: %d", result);
247  return 0;
248  }
249  while ((oggz_write(p_oggz, in_size)) > 0)
250  ;
251  return true;
252  }
253 
254  virtual void writeHeader() {
255  op.packet = (uint8_t *)&cfg;
256  op.bytes = sizeof(cfg);
257  op.granulepos = 0;
258  op.packetno = packetno++;
259  op.b_o_s = true;
260  op.e_o_s = false;
261  writePacket(op.bytes);
262  }
263 
264  virtual void writeFooter() {
265  op.packet = (uint8_t *)nullptr;
266  op.bytes = 0;
267  op.granulepos = granulepos += 1;
268  op.packetno = packetno++;
269  op.b_o_s = false;
270  op.e_o_s = true;
271  writePacket(0, OGGZ_FLUSH_AFTER);
272  }
273 
274  // Final Stream Callback
275  static size_t ogg_io_write(void *user_handle, void *buf, size_t n) {
276  LOGD("ogg_io_write: %u", n);
277  OggEncoder *self = (OggEncoder *)user_handle;
278  self->p_print->write((uint8_t *)buf, n);
279  }
280 };
281 
282 } // namespace audio_tools
